allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs: create comprehensive Warren project documentation

- Add Product Requirements Document (specs/prd.md)
  - Define Warren as simple-yet-powerful orchestrator for edge
  - Target: Swarm simplicity + K8s features - K8s complexity
  - Single binary < 100MB, zero external dependencies
  - Edge-first design with partition tolerance

- Add Technical Specification (specs/tech.md)
  - Go + Raft + containerd + WireGuard architecture
  - Manager-worker distributed system design
  - Detailed component design (scheduler, reconciler, networking)
  - Security model (mTLS, secrets encryption)
  - Deployment strategies (rolling, blue/green, canary)

- Add Milestone Plan (tasks/todo.md)
  - 6 milestones from Foundation to Open Source
  - Milestone 0: POCs (Raft, containerd, WireGuard)
  - Milestone 1-4: Core features, HA, deployment, observability
  - Milestone 5: Public release and community building

- Update Project Architecture (.agent/System/project-architecture.md)
  - Replace template with Warren-specific architecture
  - Document tech stack, components, data models
  - Define APIs, CLI, integration points
  - Include performance targets and testing strategy

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

- Add .claude/ custom slash commands

  - /prd, /tech-spec, /user-stories
  - /update_docs, /aw, /document

- Add CLAUDE.md with project-specific AI instructions
